Articles.Content:
KSP 1.1, non-Steam, 64bit Windows 7

Reentry effects invisible in front of craft.

Mods: EVE, scatterer, Distant Object, Mechjeb, Planetshine, Chatterer

I'm not a computer guy, so I can't help with the effects part.

 

However, is that a Science Jr on the bottom? I can't quite tell.

 

If you'll notice; the service bay has a crash tolerance of 14 m/s while the Jr only has a 7 or so.

Might wanna switch those around.

The service bay has a much higher heat tolerance though. The Science Jr. is better protected where it is. Actually, I've build a craft with both components switched a few days ago abd the Materials Bay explodified.

 

Sorry, no idea about the reentry effects, I've been wondering about that too.

Interesting.

I usually keep my engine on until I'm below flamey time, though, so maybe that's why I haven't blown up... yet.
